entry.title: Bad men die
entry.summary:
Author: authorettejasmin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,912Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 563

Summary: I do not sleep; a symbol burns out in the sky and my body tingles, sweats cold and aches bone-deep. The arms around me squeeze tighter and I feel him shake behind me.The one who calls me brother.The one who calls me Jason.He loves me, protects me and even though I don't remember who I am or how I got here, I know one thing.A bad man is trying to hurt him.And bad men should die.Â Jason digs his way out and Talia may find him first, but she isn't the one who keeps him.
